name: Minotaur 2
description:
Made for Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin in under 3 days with the limitation of Base your game off of a myth or legend.

I decided to base my game on the Labyrinth.

I've been away for awhile and I've felt really rusty making this game. Special thanks to Miziziziz, without that roguelike video I probably would have been even more lost.
